import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { UserIcon, UserPlusIcon, Bars3Icon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = () => { const [navIndex, setNavIndex] = useState(0); const [menuBar, setMenuBar] = useState(false) return (
  • setNavIndex(0)} > Anasayfa
  • setNavIndex(1)} > Ürünler
  • setNavIndex(2)} > Hakkımızda
  • setNavIndex(3)} > Bize Ulaşın
setMenuBar(!menuBar)} />
  • setNavIndex(0)} > Anasayfa
  • setNavIndex(1)} > Ürünler
  • setNavIndex(2)} > Hakkımızda
  • setNavIndex(3)} > Bize Ulaşın
) } export default Header
